title: Roasted vegetables
ingredients: ['4 potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 or 2 large parsnips, peeled and cut into chunks', '2 carrots, peeled and cut into large chunks', '1 red pepper, sliced', '10 or 12 brussel sprouts, halved', '4 -5 garlic cloves', '1/2 red onion, thickly sliced into rings', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'Pinch sea salt']
